title: riot where is my chest
body: i got so many s and s- but I even not get 1 chest.  Do you know what' s wrong with that? I only get key fragment. OMFG!!  I am now have 14 keys with no chest whats wrong??

replies.body:
You can only have up to four chest available to earn at any one time (this shows in your profile) you get another possible chest every week.
 
You can only earn a chest on a champion once per season. This is indicated in champions by a gold border around their portrait. Given your limited champion pool I'd say this is most likely.

If the S was in your premade, then the chest is marked against whatever champion you are playing, not what they are.
